reuters.title: FIAT UNIT FIDIS REPORTS SHARPLY HIGHER 1986 PROFIT
reuters.body: Year 1986 Net profit 132 billion lire vs 82 billion Ordinary share dividend 500 lire vs 400 Note - <Finanziaria Di Sviluppo Spa>, a financial services subsidiary of Fiat Spa <FIAT.MI>, said in a statement that shareholders approved a previously announced nominal share capital increase from 125 billion lire to 250 billion. Reuter 
